Welcome!

  • Quizoology - 21 Jan 2018

    Quizoology is an Android app which I built for my final project for Udacity’s Grow with Google Challenge Scholarship: Android Basics. The app consists of a single Activity which quizzes the user in animal facts.

  • Tennis Game Tracker - 20 Jan 2018

    Tennis Game Tracker is an Android app which I built for my first project for Udacity’s Grow with Google Challenge Scholarship: Android Basics. The app consists of a single Activity which tracks the course of a tennis game-set-match.

  • Todo List - 18 Jul 2017

    (post-apocalytic narration voice) In a world riddled with more JavaScript frameworks than atoms in the universe, comes a lone soul’s futile mission of building webapps using nothing but pure JavaScript (no, not referring to pure.js).

  • Pill - 15 Nov 2015

    Pill has been my first successful attempt at developing a game. The mechanics of it are simplistic, if not brain dead. The objective of this game is to control the “character” and eat all the pills which appear randomly throughout the screen.

  • Lorem Ipsum - 15 Nov 2015
